          <title>
            <string language="es">La derivada como límite de la tasa de variación media</string>
            <string language="en">Derivatives as a limiting case of the mean rate of variation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitungen als Grenzfall des Mittelkurses der 
Variante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dérivés comme cas de limitation de la cadence 
moyenne de la variation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derivatives como um exemplo limitando da taxa 
média da variação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Derivati come caso di limitazione del tasso medio
di variazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγωγα ως περιοριστική περίπτωση του μέσου ποσοστού
παραλλαγής</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que muestra la tangente a una curva como límite de las secantes</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which shows the tangent to a curve as the limiting case of intersecting lines</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pendiente</string>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite</string>
            <string language="en">limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tangente</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">secante</string>
            <string language="en">intersection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die die Tangente zu einer
Kurve als der Grenzfall des Schneidens zeigt, zeichnet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la simulation interactive qui montre la tangente 
à une courbe comme cas de limitation de l'intersection raye</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a simulação interativa que mostra o tangent a 
uma curva como o exemplo limitando de se cruzar alinha</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la simulazione interattiva che mostra la tangente
ad una curva come il caso di limitazione di intersezione si allinea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που εμφανίζει την εφαπτομένη σε 
μια καμπύλη ως περιοριστική περίπτωση τις γραμμές</string>
          </description>
